bug.author: nmanovic
bug.summary: LabelMe archive contains wrong files for interpolation tasks
bug.description:
I have an interpolation task where I annotated a couple of objects. See attached xml example with the actual annotation. If I dump annotations in LabelMe format for the task the archive contains duplicated files. Also I cannot upload the annotations in LabelMe format. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/cvat/files/4328840/test.txt>Annotations in CVAT for videos format</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/cvat/files/4328842/1_test.zip>Annotaitons in LabelMe format</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/cvat/files/4328853/task_test-2020_03_13_09_52_07-datumaro_project.zip>task_test-2020_03_13_09_52_07-datumaro_project.zip</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nmanovic>@nmanovic</denchmark-link> , what is the problem with import?
<denchmark-code>Can not upload annotations for the job. Code: 500. Message: "cvat.apps.engine.utils.InterpreterError: ImportError at line 120: cannot import name 'mask_to_polygon' </denchmark-code>
